overview: This movie is a political film about the future of the Europe and Crimea. There were always a lot of conflicts around the peninsula Crimea. Just recently in 2014 this area was disputed territory between Russian Federation and Ukraine. Our heroes play war in a real war zone and the borders between fiction and reality become blurred.The protagonists, both fanatic Re-enactors (people who play in historical events) show and tell us their own take on history.
title: Crimea. The Emperor's Dream
